quotes.quote: We are caught in a traffic jam of discursive thought.
Take your own route, not the route everyone is using or taking. Create your own way; there is always traffic on the common route.
One way to solve the traffic problem is to keep all the cars that are not paid for off the streets.
If our goal is to be tolerant of people who are different than we are, Chase, then we really are aiming quite low. Traffic jams are to be tolerated. People are to be celebrated.
His idea of traffic safety is going too fast for the cops to catch up.
People are sitting in traffic longer, and the types of solutions that are needed to relieve that congestion are ones that are paid for by the Highway Trust Fund.
There's a simple solution to our traffic problems. We'll have business build the roads, and government build the cars.
There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
Traffic was as much an emotional problem as it was a mechanical one.
First you learn to drive fast. Next, you learn to drive fast in traffic. Then, you learn how to do it for 500 miles.
The beaten path is the safest, but the traffic's terrible.
Traffic congestion is caused by vehicles, not by people in themselves.
You can't stop traffic on Times Square.
Avoid the traffic by using one of the park's shuttle buses and view the elk rut with a park ranger.
More traffic means more advertising dollars
Take the high road, there's a lot less traffic up there.
Take the road less traveled...there's less traffic!
Outside of traffic, there is nothing that has held this country back as much as committees.
Moroccan traffic isn't like normal traffic. It's armed combat, a war of wills, in which only the very bravest have a chance to survive.
Sometimes all it takes to stop traffic is for that right pair of red pumps.

If you are the kind of person who is waiting for the 'right' thing to happen, you might wait for a long time. It's like waiting for all the traffic lights to be green for five miles before starting the trip.
Traffic is only one of the side effects of growth.
Stuck in traffic is not an excuse. It's a sign of bad planning.
Traffic accidents have increased 100 percent in the city since the hurricane
The modern world is a crowd of very rapid racing cars all brought to a standstill and stuck in a block of traffic.
Parents are traffic signs that are always in our blind spots
If you provide good alternatives for public transport, you won't have traffic problems

Sometimes, when there's too much traffic clogging up the road, you need to take a different route. But following the same path as everyone else can stall your progress in reaching your investment goals too.
If you make more roads, you will have more traffic.
You don't make any money sitting in traffic.
